frontmatter.title: Declarative Configuration
frontmatter.description: All resources manag e  d through a GitOps process must be completely expressed declaratively.

frontmatter.title: Version controlled immutable storage
frontmatter.description: Declarative descriptions are stored in a repository that supports immutability, versioning, and version history. For example, git.

frontmatter.title: Automated delivery
frontmatter.description: Delivery of the declarative descriptions, from the repository to the runtime environment, is fully automated.

frontmatter.title: Software Agents
frontmatter.description: Reconcilers maintain system state and apply the resources described in the declarative configuration.

frontmatter.title: Closed-loop
frontmatter.description: Actions are performed on the divergence between the version-controlled declarative configuration and the actual state of the target system.
